description:
In this course Jacques Stotzem will be teaching you the basics of acoustic fingerstyle guitar. In 6 Videolessons you will learn how to play two nice basic compositions by Jacques Stotzem.

In this online guitar lesson / workshop you will discover the well known "Basic Travis Picking" and some technical exercises like slides, pull off and hammer on.

In addition to the technical exercises, that are really important, we also turn over to Jacques compositions:

  • Learn the song "Step by Step" incl. MP3 and TRANSCRIPTION
  • Learn the song "Another Blues in E" incl. MP3 and TRANSCRIPTION
  • Everything is transcribed in sheet music and tabs / tabulatur

Including: 2 exclusive performance videos by Jacques Stotzem (Twenty one & Picking in Paris)

Complete runtime: 91 minutes

If you finished this basic course watch out for our advanced series of Jacques finger style :)
title: FingerstyleGuitar by Jacques Stotzem - Basic Level
